name: Sky Orange
description:
By MD.Huynh & Isamu

Loosely inspired by the works of Wes Anderson.

Disclaimer: not recommended for people with motion sickness.

Controls

WASD/Arrows to walk.

Shift to run.

Mouse over to change camera orientation.

ESC to access menu.

Assets

Fantasy Skybox FREE

SebLague's First Person Controller

Ben Esposito's First Person Drifter

BGM 

Alexandre Desplat — Mr. Moustafa

Leonard Bernstein — The Young Person's Guide to Orchestra Op. 34

Alexandre Desplat — Canto At Gabelmeister's Peak

Alexandre Desplat — A Prayer For Madame D
